*Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and D=
eemos*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


  "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll com=
e." Inzola said.

  "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos sai=
d. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

  "Those Alliance and Preds will be so=
rry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

  "Th=
e Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a few stand out, you are on=
e of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, =
July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Wrath smiles* =
Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...=
We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
      ----- Original Message =
----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Satur=
day, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Inzola=
 smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

      "Nice to meet such a charming and p=
owerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for abou=
t 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

      "So, what are we supposed=
 to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
        ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
=


        Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke ab=
out. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
    =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
      =
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          Deemos looked at the CR Chamber whe=
n it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

          "Maximal base, i=
t's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

          "Who are y=
ou?" Inzola asked Wrath.

          Gangon's spark is still waiting.

     =
     Artist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed e=
xercises him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs=
 into the mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thou=
ghts pass through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

          "Oh, that wa=
s some blow, but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

          "Plintissa=
? Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He r=
emembered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were workin=
g, so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

          "P=
lintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. =
Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed an=
d they kissed. After the kiss.

          "Do me a favor, Artist, stop usin=
g rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

          "Okay, I won't rhyme,=
 we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist t=
ook Plintissa to a grassy plain.

          Dracona held up her scanning de=
vice in front of Scorponok's face.

          "I can find that device I los=
t." Dracona said.

          "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a pi=
ece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok=
 with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.=


          The Radicons sat there still...
